attributes.action: ban the use of Depleted Uranium in any munitions used by the UK armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in addition to destroying all stockpiles of DU munitions already in service.

The health risks associated with DU dust (greatly increased risk of developing cancer) have been made clear in Iraq and as a responsible nation we should not be using radioactive substances on the battlefield, which then enter the local environment and food chain, causing death and suffering long after the battle has finished.

This is an immoral and illegal weapon and should be banned, worldwide.
